title: 111_hr3494
content: Makes funds appropriated to the Department of Defense (DOD) available for costs incurred by the National Guard in conducting international military-to-civilian contacts, civilian-to-civilian contacts, and comparable activities in order to: (1) support objectives of the commander of the combatant command for the theater of operations in which the contacts occur, (2) build international civil-military partnerships and capacity, (3) strengthen cooperation between US and foreign departments and agencies. (4) facilitate intergovernmental collaboration between the US government and foreign governments. And (5) facilitate the exchange of information between the US government and foreign governments on matters relating to defense and security.
